title: book_Shakespeare's_Kitchen
text:
ISBN-13: 9780375509179.
ISBN-10: 0375509178.
Title: Shakespeare's Kitchen.
Subtitle: Renaissance Recipes for the Contemporary Cook.
Authors: Francine Segan.
Categories: Cooking.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=ecwAAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A noted food historian brings to life the classic foods of William Shakepeare's world in a series of updated, easy-to-prepare recipes, drawn from sixteenth- and seventeenth-century cookbooks, for a variety of tasty dishes that include Grilled Tuna with Carrots and Sweet Onions, Fish Bisque with Chestnuts and Artichokes, and Red Snapper with Caviar, among others. 35,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2003.
Average Rating: 3.99.
Number of Pages: 288.
Ratings Count: 108.
